about_the_game:
To Earth: The Last Hope

In the year 2050, the world is facing a post-apocalyptic scenario. The zombie invasion threatens humanity, and the last hopes have been left on Mars. The ultimate salvation for humanity lies in the hands of a robot equipped with the latest technology.

It's an exhilarating survival and action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. You are chosen as the last hope for humanity, a robot selected amidst the zombie invasion. Sent from Mars to Earth to prevent the collapse of the world after the zombie invasion, your mission is to fight against zombie armies, rescue surviving humans, and strive to find the last treatments to save the world.

Embark on a journey filled with challenging missions. As you take off from the cold surface of Mars, hear the cries of Earth and continue your journey with determination. While defending against zombie attacks, bravely fight to rescue the remaining survivors.

However, besides enemies, you'll also have to overcome natural disasters, abandoned facilities, and other dangers. Utilize your skills to navigate through the ruins of the world, rescue survivors, and find the necessary treatments to save the world.

We invite you to an exciting journey filled with an engaging story, thrilling action, and challenging missions. Can you stop the zombie invasion? The fate of humanity lies in your hands.

Survive as a Mars Rover vehicle, humanity's last hope, in a post-apocalyptic world! Chaos Journey is an exhilarating action and exploration game. In the midst of the zombie invasion, bravely fight to save the world and uncover mysteries by solving puzzles.

Action-Packed Battles:
Engage in battles against zombie armies and defend yourself with various weapons. Fight against zombies using a variety of weapons. Use your skills and strategies to survive.

Challenging Puzzles:
Navigate through ruined cities and abandoned facilities while solving mysterious puzzles. Find keys, unlock doors, and uncover secrets. Use your intelligence to solve puzzles and unlock new paths.

Exploration and Escape Missions:
Explore dangerous areas and collect important resources. Additionally, complete escape missions against time constraints to escape the zombie invasion. Be careful as you explore the map and find hidden passages to avoid enemies.

Unique Gaming Experience:
Chaos Journey offers a unique gaming experience with an exciting story, thrilling action, and challenging puzzles. You are humanity's last hope. Are you ready?

content_descriptors.notes: Since our game takes place in a zombie-infested world, it contains elements such as violence, blood and killing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200g or Intel i3 3220
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950M
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This Game only works on 64 bit. Make sure your computer supports 64-bit.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 4500, Ryzen 7 Series, AMD Ryzen 9 Series or Intel i7 Series, Intel i9 Series
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This Game only works on 64 bit. Make sure your computer supports 64-bit.

short_description: It is a survival and action game set in a post-apocalyptic world. This robot, which was sent from Mars to Earth to prevent the destruction of Earth after the zombie invasion, tries to save living people by fighting hordes of zombies and produce cures to save the world.
